procedure.title: Configuring syslog-ng Linux clients for RLTP
procedure.para: To configure the syslog-ng Linux clients for RLTP, complete the following steps:

step.para: Open the /opt/syslog-ng/etc/syslog-ng.conf configuration file in a text editor.
Replace the line starting with destination d_logserver with the following:
Replace <PEServerIP> with the hostname or IP address of the &abbrev; server.
Save the file and restart syslog-ng.
Remote logging can be tested the same way as described in .
